title: Invisible Item Frames Resource Pack
text:
This is a very simple but useful texture pack that will make all Item Frames in your Minecraft world invisible. This is good if you want to put your items or blocks on display or store them in a very nice looking way.

# What's new?

â€¢ Added Invisible Stone Cutter
â€¢ Now works with the Update Aquatic

# How to activate it

â€¢ Download and install the resource pack
â€¢ Activate the pack you installed in your world settings or global settings (Settings > Global resources)

title: More Treasure Addon
text:
This add-on helps you find more useful items in the game. It will modify the loot for the different chests in-game. All chests will be filled with much more items than usual and most of the items will also be useful for your survival.

# How to install

â€¢ Download and install the behavior pack
â€¢ Activate the behavior pack in your world settings

title: Redstone Mechanic Addon
text:
This add-on replaces some mobs with cool robots. Some robots are friendly with the player, and some robots attack me or attack each other. And some robots can ride, and some robots explode when destroyed. It also contains a lot of fun things.

Now, try these cool robots!

# Mobs changed into robots

â€¢ Creeper
â€¢ Husk
â€¢ Iron Golem
â€¢ Snow Golem
â€¢ Wither Skeleton
â€¢ Skeleton
â€¢ Witch
â€¢ Stray
â€¢ Destroyer (Skeleton)
â€¢ Golden Destroyer (Stray)
â€¢ Redstone Motor (Witch)
â€¢ Dropper Robot (Zombie Villager)
â€¢ TNT Anator (Zombie Pigman))
â€¢ Necro Circuit (Ghast)
â€¢ Legion (Enderman)
â€¢ Auto Scorpion (Spider)
â€¢ Mega Auto Scorpion (Cave Spider)
â€¢ Flyborg (Zombie)
â€¢ Pyroborg (Husk)
â€¢ Protector Bot (Blaze)
â€¢ Robot Workbench (Pig)
â€¢ V Mechanic (Wither Boss)

Robot Workbench (Pig) can be used for crafting any of the robots which are helpful for the players.

â€¢ Coal = Flying Chair
â€¢ Iron Ingot = Dispenser Robot
â€¢ Gold Ingot = Redstone Motor
â€¢ Emerald = Observer Robot
â€¢ Redstone = Turret

# What's new in this update?

â€¢ Octobomb (Squid)
â€¢ Momotone and Kinotone (Elder Guardian and Guardian)
â€¢ Sea Destroyer (Drowned)
â€¢ Redstone Sword (Fishing Rod)
â€¢ Redstone Staff (Trident)
â€¢ Bug fixes

# How to install

â€¢ Download and install both behavior and resource packs
â€¢ Edit your world, then Activate packs in the Add-ons section.

title: Oceancraft PE Addon (v4)
text:
Oceancraft is an add-on to add a total of 18 aquatic creatures such as whales, crabs, octopuses, and sharks to your Minecraft.

â€¢ Butterfly Fish: Passive (replaces Witch)
â€¢ Lionfish: Aggressive towards players and fish, poisonous (replaces Zombie)
â€¢ Stone Fish: Aggressive, poisonous (replaces Husk)
â€¢ Jellyfish: Attacks fish and players, poisonous (replaces Cows)
â€¢ Shrimp: Passive (replaces Pig)
â€¢ Sharks: Hostile toward players, fish and sheep (replaces Guardian & Elder Guardian)
â€¢ Crabs: Attacks players and fish (replaces Spider & Cave Spider)
â€¢ Octopuses: Hostile, attacks players and fish (replaces Skeleton & Stray)
â€¢ Whales: Passive, attacks fish and shrimp (replaces Polar Bear)
â€¢ Mantarrayas: Passive, attacks fish (replaces Evoker)
â€¢ Piranhas: Hostile towards players and other mobs (replaces Silverfish)
â€¢ Swordfish: Attacks players and fish (replaces Zombie Pigman)

# How to install

â€¢ Download and install the McAddon
â€¢ Activate both behavior and resource pack you installed in your world settings

title: Plants vs Zombies Add-on
text:
This add-on brings characters from the famous video game Plants vs Zombies to the Minecraft world. Also, some blocks and items have been changed based on the game.
Plants vs. Zombies is a tower defense video game developed and originally published by PopCap Games.

# Characters

â€¢ Small Spores (Rabbit)
â€¢ Big Spores (Spider)
â€¢ Potatopum (Creeper)
â€¢ Lanzaguisantes (Shulker)
â€¢ Nut (Iron Golem)
â€¢ Zombies (Zombie, Husk)

# How to install

â€¢ Download and install both behavior and resource pack
â€¢ Activate the packs you installed in your world settings

title: Epic Fortnite Skin Pack (v3.1)
text:
This is another Fortnite skin pack with a total of 19 skins. Fortnite is a co-op sandbox survival game developed by Epic Games.

# Skins

â€¢ Cuddle
â€¢ Omen (No Cape)
â€¢ ShadowOps
â€¢ Love Ranger
â€¢ Omega (Purple)
â€¢ Raven
â€¢ Zoey
â€¢ Black Knight
â€¢ The Reaper
â€¢ Teknique
â€¢ Omega
â€¢ Carbide
â€¢ Wukong
â€¢ Levithan
â€¢ Brite Bomber
â€¢ Red Knight
â€¢ Skull Trooper
â€¢ Dark Vanguard
â€¢ Rex

# What's new in v3.1?

â€¢ Added Omen, ShadowOps, Love Ranger, Omega (Purple)

# Installation

â€¢ Download and install the skin pack
â€¢ On the first screen, tap the hanger icon.
â€¢ Then you will see the skin pack you installed.

title: Crafting Dead PE Addon (v9)
text:
This addon is a remake of the mod for Java Edition called â€œCrafting Deadâ€. The add-on includes several elements which you would recognize if youâ€™ve ever watched The Walking Dead which is a very popular TV show about people surviving a zombie apocalypse.

# Mobs

â€¢ Walker â€“ Replaces normal zombie, no longer burns in day light, slowed down, same health
â€¢ Runner â€“ Replaces husk zombie, fast, rarely leaps at player (bug), less health
â€¢ Survivors (Pistol, P90, Rifle) â€“ Replaces skeletons, strays, and wither skeletons, will help kill zombies but neutral to players.

# Weapons

â€¢ Baseball Bat (Wooden Sword)
â€¢ Crowbar (Stone Sword)
â€¢ Samurai Sword (Iron Sword)
â€¢ Bowie Knife (Golden Sword)
â€¢ Fire Axe (Iron Axe)
â€¢ Chainsaw (Diamond Axe)
â€¢ M9/Ammo (Bow, Arrow)
â€¢ M4A1 (Bottle o' Enchanting)
â€¢ CZ 452 (Ender Pearl)
â€¢ Harpoon Gun (Fishing Rod)

# Foods

â€¢ Beetroot Soup (Canned Beetroot)
â€¢ Mushroom Stew (Canned Mushrooms)
â€¢ Rabbit Stew (Canned Meat)
â€¢ Empty Can (Bowl)

# What's new in v9?

â€¢ Stoner 63 replaced with M4A1
â€¢ Mini Uzi replaced with P90
â€¢ When holding the Harpoon Gun the Fish button now says â€œShootâ€

# How to install

â€¢ Download and install the McAddon
â€¢ Activate both behavior and resource pack in your world settings

title: Music+ Resource Pack
text:
This pack makes some changes to how the in-game music plays. People who enjoy listening to Minecraftâ€™s music will find this pack improves the way Minecraft music works! Perfect for anyone who want a more pleasurable experience while playing the game.

# Universal Features

The following are features which are universal / global. Meaning, they affect all pack options.

â€¢ Music plays constantly with no silent periods
â€¢ All songs play at 0.5 volume
â€¢ Shuniji, Dragon Fish, and Axolotl from Java Edition have been added
â€¢ Creative, Survival, Menu, and Water music plays interchangeably
â€¢ End and Boss play interchangeably
â€¢ Dog plays after the Cat music disc (Easter egg from Console Edition)
â€¢ Music disc music will still play from the jukebox regardless of setting chosen below

# Pack Options

There are multiple different pack options. Each one includes different features and music tracks.

â€¢ Default â€“ This is the normal setting for the pack with all the features listed above.
â€¢ No Water Music â€“ This is the exact same as Default, but without Shuniji, Dragon Fish, or Axolotl.
â€¢ Old Music â€“ This uses the music from before the 2013 Music Update. It doesnâ€™t use Creative, Water, Nether, End, Credits, or Menu music.
â€¢ Old Music+ â€“ This is almost the same as Old Music, the difference being that it still uses Nether, End, and Credits music.
â€¢ Total Mix â€“ This lets any music, including Credits, End, Boss, Nether, Water, Menu, Survival, and Creative play at any time.

You can switch pack by going to Global Resources in Settings and pressing the Gear icon.


# How to activate it

â€¢ Download and install the resource pack
â€¢ Activate the pack you installed in your world settings or global settings (Settings > Global resources)

title: Magic Spells Addon
text:
This add-on allows you to use magic spells within the game. To do so, the textures and behaviors of some items have changed.

You can find out more by watching the YouTube video below.

# How to install

â€¢ Download and install the McAddon
â€¢ Activate both behavior and resource pack in your world settings

title: Better Paintings Resource Pack
text:
This texture pack changes the look of all the paintings in Minecraft! Some are hand made, some are taken from images & further modified. The paintings stay true to Minecraftâ€™s pixely look, and donâ€™t go for an HD look.

# How to activate it

â€¢ Download and install the resource pack
â€¢ Activate the pack you installed in Settings (Settings > Global resources)
